name: Whispering Foothills
story: There's a danger about this place.
The feeling has intensified venturing east across the grasslands.
You loosen the short-sword at your side.
The job in Brist said to find Otto at World's End Tavern. Gold, and plenty of it, promised.
A red-orange light flickers in the distance.
observe_details: Rolling plains gradually grow to gentle slopes signifying the start of the Whispering Foothills ahead.
Past the hills, the massive peaks of the two mountain ranges guarding World's End stand silhouetted in the clear night sky.
A howl pierces the night. Wolves. And you've found signs of other unknown denizens.
You see a dim light off in the distance.

resource_nodes.name: Broken cart
discovery_details: A broken cart lies abandoned just off the road.

resource_nodes.name: Discarded travel bag
discovery_details: A discarded travel bag lies near the road.

landmarks.name: Abandoned Mine
discovery_details: The black maw of an large abandoned mine is visible over the crest of a small cliff face.

landmarks.name: World's End Tavern
discovery_details: A haphazardly constructed tavern sits along the road just inside the first foothills. The tattered sign reads 'W R DS  ND T VERN'.
